thread.title: Zendesk’s Mid-Market SF office a study in tranquillity
thread.title_full: Zendesk’s Mid-Market SF office a study in tranquillity - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Julie Balise
title: Zendesk’s Mid-Market SF office a study in tranquillity
text:
Photo: Nathaniel Y. Downes, The Chronicle Rooms have names not numbers at the offices of Zendesk on Market Street in San Francisco. Rooms have names not numbers at the offices of Zendesk on Market...
Zendesk’s office is designed with “hygge” — a Danish word evoking “coziness” — in mind. Rooms have names not numbers at the offices of Zendesk on Market Street in San Francisco. Rooms have names not numbers at the offices of Zendesk on Market...
Zendesk’s office is designed with “hygge” — a Danish word evoking “coziness” — in mind.
